name: Mini Vegan Vanilla Pound Cakes - Vegan Pound Cake Recipe
description: This Vegan Vanilla pound cake is easy, soy-free, soft and delicious. Make these mini loafs. Vegan Dairy-free, soy-free recipe.
recipeIngredient: 2 Tbsp flaxmeal (flax seed meal, use golden flax)
1/2 cup + 2 Tbsp ground raw sugar or other fine sugar
Zest of 1 lemon if making a lemon pound loaf

recipeInstructions.text: Wet: In a bowl, mix the flaxmeal and almond milk, let sit for a minute. Then add everything else under wet. Mix until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Wet: In a bowl, mix the flaxmeal and almond milk, let sit for a minute. Then add everything else under wet. Mix until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, add everything under dry, whisk and keep ready. If using zest, add to dry ingredients and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, add everything under dry, whisk and keep ready. If using zest, add to dry ingredients and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small pan, heat 3 Tbsp oil on medium heat. Add the flour and cook until aromatic. 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small pan, heat 3 Tbsp oil on medium heat. Add the flour and cook until aromatic. 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Take the pan off heat and add about a Tbsp of the almond milk. Mix in and add the rest of the almond milk. Mix and put back on low-medium heat. Mix until a thick roux is formed and the it leaves the pan. 1 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Take the pan off heat and add about a Tbsp of the almond milk. Mix in and add the rest of the almond milk. Mix and put back on low-medium heat. Mix until a thick roux is formed and the it leaves the pan. 1 minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the roux cool for a minute then mix into the wet mixture. Mix until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the roux cool for a minute then mix into the wet mixture. Mix until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the wet and dry. Drop batter onto well greased and floured mini pans. Even it out using a spatula or oiled hands. The batter will be very thick like a spongy soft dough.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine the wet and dry. Drop batter onto well greased and floured mini pans. Even it out using a spatula or oiled hands. The batter will be very thick like a spongy soft dough.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated 350 degrees F / 180ºc oven for 30 minutes. Reduce heat to 325f / 160ºc and bake for another 5 minutes for a browner crust.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated 350 degrees F / 180ºc oven for 30 minutes. Reduce heat to 325f / 160ºc and bake for another 5 minutes for a browner crust.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool completely before slicing. Serve with whipped non dairy cream, strawberries or as is.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool completely before slicing. Serve with whipped non dairy cream, strawberries or as is.
